# Wealthbox CRM

## Overview
- **Website:** https://www.wealthbox.com
- **Category:** CRM (Customer Relationship Management) - Financial Advisors
- **Description:** CRM and AI workspace designed specifically for financial advisors, featuring contact management, email sync, workflow automation, pipeline tracking, and AI-powered meeting notes.
- **Status:** Active
- **Last Updated:** 2026-02-11

## Pricing Tiers

| Tier | Price | Billing Cycle | Key Features |
|------|-------|---------------|--------------|
| Starter | Contact for pricing | Monthly/Annual | 3 contact roles, 3 teams, 1 opportunity pipeline, 2GB storage, 1 workspace |
| Professional | Contact for pricing | Monthly/Annual | 5 contact roles, 5 teams, 3 opportunity pipelines, 5GB storage, 1 workspace, workflow milestones |
| Premium | Contact for pricing | Monthly/Annual | Unlimited contact roles & teams, 5 opportunity pipelines, 10GB storage, 5 workspaces, workflow outcomes, subtasks |
| Enterprise | Custom pricing | Custom | Unlimited everything, 20GB storage, unlimited workspaces, enterprise SSO, dedicated account manager, priority support |

### Notes on Pricing
- AI Notetaker is an add-on available for all tiers
- All tiers include core CRM features: contacts, email sync, tasks, calendar, workflows, reports
- Enterprise tier includes advanced admin controls, VPN support, SFTP backups, and organization-wide security enforcement
- Free 14-day trial available

## Key Features

### Core Capabilities
- **Contact & Household Management:** Unlimited contacts with segmentation tags, roles, and customizable groups
- **Wealthbox Mail:** Two-way email sync with Gmail/Outlook, Chrome extension, email templates, open/link tracking
- **Task Management:** Create, assign, and track tasks linked to contact records with suggested actions
- **Opportunity Management:** Visual Kanban boards for pipeline tracking with drag-and-drop
- **Calendar:** Two-way sync with Google Calendar, Apple Calendar, Outlook, and custom views
- **Workflows:** Customizable workflow automation with templates, milestones, outcomes, and form builders
- **Meetings:** Meeting preparation, collaboration, and follow-up tools
- **AI Notetaker:** Automatically record, transcribe, and generate actionable meeting notes
- **Projects:** Project management integrated with CRM
- **Reports:** Automated and dynamic/customized reporting with AI assistance

### Advanced Features
- **AI-Powered:** AI notetaker for automatic transcription and note generation, AI for reports
- **Customization:** Custom fields, customizable dashboards, role-based homepages, custom workflow actions
- **Security:** Bank-level security, 2-factor authentication, SOC 2 compliance, session timeout, workspace/organization-wide 2FA enforcement (Enterprise)
- **Team Collaboration:** Activity streams, coworker notifications, multiple workspaces, administrative controls
- **Mobile:** Mobile app companion for iOS and Android
- **Broadcast Email:** Send email campaigns to contact segments
- **Compliant Note Archiving:** SEC/FINRA compliant archiving

### Limitations
- Pricing not publicly listed (contact for quotes)
- Contact roles, teams, opportunity pipelines, and storage limited by tier
- Workflow advanced features (outcomes, subtasks, form builders) only in higher tiers
- AI Notetaker is an add-on, not included in base pricing
- Enterprise features (SSO, VPN support, SFTP backups) only available in Enterprise tier

## Integrations

Wealthbox has one of the most extensive integration ecosystems in financial advisor CRM space with **170+ native and partner integrations**. Integrations are organized by category:

### Portfolio Management (35)
1. **Addepar** - Native - View summarized portfolio details in Wealthbox
2. **AdviceCloud** - Native - Bi-directional sync of households, contacts, tasks, notes, workflows
3. **AssetBook** - Native - Link contact records to AssetBook clients/households
4. **Black Diamond** - Native - Receive client info, view account summaries, holdings, transactions
5. **Blueleaf** - Native - View balances, performance, allocation, detailed holdings
6. **BridgeFT** - Native - Link contacts to BridgeFT dashboards/reports
7. **Broadridge** - Native - Single sign-on integration with Wealth Aggregation platform
8. **Capitect** - Native - Link clients, view account details
9. **CircleBlack** - Native - Auto-create contacts, action tasks inside CircleBlack
10. **Deepvest** - Native - Collect/update CRM data via shareable links
11. **Flourish** - Native - Pre-fill client applications and send invites
12. **Fispoke** - Native - Pre-fill deposit/lending applications
13. **Invent** - Native - Sync client data, notes, tasks across systems
14. **Investipal** - Native - Auto-add leads with risk tolerance, assets, income
15. **Max** - Native - Auto-populate contact info in Max dashboard
16. **Milemarker** - Native - Connect data warehouse with Wealthbox
17. **Morningstar Office** - Native - View account details, balances, positions from contact records
18. **Orion** - Native - View client account balances, single sign-on
19. **Panoramix** - Native - Sync data across platforms for accurate reporting
20. **Smartdata** - Native - Access portfolios, statements, fees, transactions
21. **Tamarac** - Native - View account details, holdings, billing, custom fields
22. **Turnqey** - Native - Gather/view client cryptoasset data
23. **Wove** - Native - View aggregated multi-custodial data from hundreds of sources

### Custodial Platforms (9)
24. **Altruist** - Native - Combine CRM data with custodial platform data
25. **AssetMark** - Native - Connect client accounts, view balances, holdings, demographics

28. **Charles Schwab** - Native - SSO, view account details, positions, transactions

31. **SEI** - Native - Single sign-on, view client accounts
32. **TradePMR (Fusion)** - Native - Access Wealthbox from Fusion, pull client info for account opening

### Automation Platforms (4)

160. **Integromat (Make)** - Native - Integrate 650+ apps
161. **Zapier** - Native - Integrate 2,000+ apps
162. **Asana** - Zapier - Project management

### Other Notable Integrations
163. **Hubly** - Native - Pre-populate client info for workflows
164. **Slack** - Native - Real-time notifications on updates/activity
165. **Strety** - Native - Sync To Dos with tasks for EOS® execution

### Integration Features
- **Native integrations:** Majority are deep, native integrations (not just Zapier)
- **Single sign-on:** Available for major platforms (Schwab, Fidelity, LPL, Orion, eMoney, MoneyGuide, etc.)
- **Bi-directional sync:** Many integrations offer two-way data flow
- **Partner App Integrations:** Included in all tiers
- **Integration Permissions:** Enterprise tier can control which integrations users can access

## API & Developer Info
- **API Available:** Yes
- **Webhooks:** Not explicitly documented
- **Rate Limits:** Not publicly documented
- **Documentation Quality:** Not evaluated (requires account)
- **API Docs Link:** API Development Support available in Professional tier and above

## Support & Documentation
- **Support Channels:** Help Desk, Live Help, Phone, Email
- **Response Time:** Priority Enterprise Support for Enterprise tier
- **Documentation Quality:** Knowledge Base Q&A, Video Tutorial Library available
- **Community:** Not explicitly mentioned
- **Training:** CRM Migration Assistance, Enterprise Implementation Program (Enterprise)

## Evaluation Notes

### Pros
- **Extensive integration ecosystem:** 170+ integrations covering nearly every fintech tool financial advisors use
- **Industry-specific:** Purpose-built for financial advisors with compliance features (SEC/FINRA archiving, SOC 2)
- **AI capabilities:** Native AI notetaker for automatic transcription and actionable meeting notes
- **Workflow automation:** Sophisticated workflow builder with templates, milestones, outcomes, and form builders
- **Email integration:** Deep bi-directional sync with Gmail and Outlook, Chrome extension
- **Security:** Bank-level security, 2FA, SOC 2 compliance, enterprise-grade controls
- **Opportunity management:** Visual Kanban boards for pipeline tracking
- **Reporting:** Dynamic customizable reports with AI assistance
- **Mobile app:** Full-featured mobile companion
- **Free trial:** 14-day trial available

### Cons
- **Pricing transparency:** No public pricing (must contact sales)
- **Storage limits:** File storage capped by tier (2GB to 20GB)
- **AI Notetaker:** Additional cost (add-on)
- **Feature gating:** Many advanced features only in higher tiers (workflow outcomes, subtasks, unlimited pipelines)
- **Enterprise features:** Critical features like SSO, VPN support, SFTP only in Enterprise
- **Workspace limits:** Limited workspaces in lower tiers
- **Learning curve:** Rich feature set may require training time

### Alternatives
- **Redtail CRM:** Competitor in financial advisor CRM space (already researched)
- **Salesforce Financial Services Cloud:** More general, enterprise CRM
- **Junxure Cloud:** Alternative financial advisor CRM
- **Wealthbox alternatives:** Redtail, Salesforce, Junxure, SmartOffice, Practifi

### Use Cases
- Financial advisors managing client relationships
- Wealth management firms needing pipeline tracking
- RIAs (Registered Investment Advisors) requiring compliance features
- Advisory teams needing workflow automation
- Firms with complex tech stacks requiring extensive integrations
- Advisors wanting AI-powered meeting notes and task automation
- Teams managing opportunities across multiple pipelines
- Firms needing enterprise-grade security and admin controls
